TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CultureNotFoundException extends System.ArgumentException implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
type CultureNotFoundException = class inherit ArgumentException interface ISerializable

summary.span: 当方法尝试构造不可用的区域性时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a method attempts to construct a culture that is not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A每次的方法内最终尝试构造的无效的区域性时引发异常。A exception is thrown whenever the construction of an invalid culture is eventually attempted within a method. 通常情况下，调用以下方法之一失败创建，或者返回区域性时引发此异常：Most commonly, this exception is thrown when a call to one of the following methods fails to create or return a culture: - 构造函数。 constructors. - 方法。The method. - 方法。The method. > [!WARNING] > 在 Windows 7 和更高版本操作系统上，.NET Framework 从操作系统中检索区域性数据。On Windows 7 and later operating systems, the .NET Framework retrieves culture data from the operating system. 如果操作系统是找不到区域性，并且区域性不是一个自定义区域性或替换区域性引发异常。The exception is thrown if the operating system is unable to find the culture, and the culture is not a custom culture or a replacement culture. 如果调用的代码尝试实例化对象使用的区域性名称，属性包含无效的名称和属性返回对象属性是`false`.If the calling code attempted to instantiate a object by using a culture name, the property contains the invalid name, and the property of the object returned by the property is `false`. 如果调用的代码尝试实例化对象使用的区域性标识符，属性返回对象属性包含无效的标识符和的值属性是`null`。If the calling code attempted to instantiate a object by using a culture identifier, the property of the object returned by the property contains the invalid identifier, and the value of the property is `null`. 使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT，其值 0x80070057。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT, which has the value 0x80070057.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT，其值 0x80070057。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT, which has the value 0x80070057.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT，其值 0x80070057。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT, which has the value 0x80070057.

span.span: The error message to display with this exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性使用的值的新实例`message`参数。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the value of the `message` parameter. `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT，其值 0x80070057。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARGUMENT, which has the value 0x80070057.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性使用的值的新实例`message`参数。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using the value of the `message` parameter. `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.

summary.span: 获取找不到的区域性标识符。

span.span: Gets the culture identifier that cannot be found.
The invalid culture identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用的代码尝试实例化或检索对象使用无效的区域性标识符，属性返回对象属性包含无效的标识符。If the calling code attempted to instantiate or retrieve a object by using an invalid culture identifier, the property of the object returned by the property contains the invalid identifier. 否则为其属性是`false`。Otherwise, its property is `false`.
